casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 31, 2014

[Cite as 03/31/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1292.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2011-0451. State v. Herring.

Mahoning App. No. 08-MA-213, 2011-Ohio-662. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Mahoning County.

Upon consideration of appellee’s motion to enlarge the time for oral argument scheduled on Tuesday, April 29, 2014, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
